featured.text: Autograph dealers can be found in almost any sizable city, and collectors may get hundreds, even thousands, of dollars for things signed by anyone from Mozart to Madonna, Thomas Jefferson to JFK.
The drug dealer was ________ by the police while he was selling cocaine to a high school student.

definition.en_def: A person or business that buys and sells goods or services.
definition.example: The car dealer offered a great deal on the new model.
